types.html:
état d'esprit m (plural états d'esprit)

  1. state of mind (psychological state of someone's cognitive processes at a certain time; the condition or character of a person's thoughts or feelings)
  2. mindset (a way of thinking; an attitude or opinion, especially a habitual one)

title: état d'esprit
pronunHtml: • IPA(key): /e.ta d‿ɛs.pʁi/
